Nikki Bella chose her dress just 30 minutes before she was set to walk down the aisle with Artem Chigvintsev in Paris in August.
That dress was just one of four she wore on her big day, she told Bri… [+5372 chars]

articles.author: Ade Onibada
articles.title: “I Started Crying Almost Instantly": Fans With Rex Orange County Tattoos Are Devastated After He Was Charged With Sexual Assault - BuzzFeed News
articles.description: "I knew nothing was gonna be the same after hearing this,” said a fan who has Rex Orange County lyrics tattooed on her arm.
articles.content: The musician, whose real name is Alexander O'Connor, pleaded not guilty in a UK court on Monday to six charges of sexually assaulting a woman over two days in June. The provisional trial date is Jan.… [+934 chars]
